name: ATC Operations - Hong Kong
description:
In this fast paced atc simulation game, you are an air traffic controller, controlling departing and arriving aircraft.
Watch out for bad weather and make sure the aircraft are within a safe distance from each other!

Included airports:
-Hong Kong International airport (HKG/VHHH)
-Shenzen airport (SZX/ZGSZ)
-Macao airport (MFM/VMMC)
